medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of searing abdominal pain radiating to the lower back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began last night after eating hummus and have been constant since then, somewhat relieved by pain medications. Associated symptoms include nausea, diarrhea, and anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes Type 1, Hepatitis C genotype III (stage II inflammation and grade 2 to 3 fibrosis), pancreatitis.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with atrial fibrillation; siblings without heart disease.
